text: @shannonrwatts As a health professional, I find this shocking & very disrespectful. Why aren't these customers considering the fact they are placing each others' lives at great risk of Covid-19 illness & even death. Why is the owner/manager not complying with state regs?@CDPHE @DenPublicHealth
